item.title: About
item.description: About Annotorious Annotorious is a modernized reboot of the now outdated original Annotorious. License Annotorious is licensed under the terms of the BSD 3-Clause license. That basically means: you can use this code for free, in whatever way you want, for non-commerical and commercial projects. But attribute Annotorious in your project at a suitable location. And bear in mind: this code comes as is, don’t come complaining to us stuff breaks ;-)
